document.full_text: ousted chief executive doug logan and usa track and field (usatf) have reached a settlement in his wrongful termination lawsuit against the governing body, according to court documents.
document.title: former ceo reaches settlement with usatf: court
lines_and_colors: ousted chief executive doug logan and usa track and field (usatf) have reached a settlement in his wrongful termination lawsuit against the governing body, according to court documents.
